markings: 'Let Me Die the Death of the Rich/[illegible]And Let My Latter End Be/[illegible]His·Elizabeth Last[?]·Sept[illegible]/1788', in multicolored embroidery floss, at top of sampler; 'Horace Brown[underlined]', in black ink, on backing paper near top; 'Mr. and Mrs. Jeremy Brown/NORTH MOWING/Springfield/Vermont', on label, tacked to back of frame at UL corner; '#2', in pencil, below label
title: Sampler
